Name: Hidden Cats in London
About the game: Meow meow meow dear friends! There are Hidden Cats in London , let's find them all. A short and pleasant experience in a big and pleasant illustration! Start with a Beautiful monochromatic scenario, relax and find all the cats one by one to reveal the final colored art . Play through different modes, find special cats, and unlock bonus levels! NORMAL MODE Find 100 cats in fixed positions. 3 hints. ADVANCED MODE Find 150 cats in semi-random positions. Find special cats and city people to earn hints and unlock bonus levels. Find 50 hidden kittens on each level: Book Shop, Pub, Tube Station, Music Studio, Palace Room. 1 hint use. Accessibility Dark Mode Color Blindness Mode Invert Mouse Zoom Mouse Drag Sensibility Edge Screen Scrolling
